quiz.question: What is the basic idea behind Quick Sort?
options: Divide the array into halves and merge them later
Select a pivot and partition the array around it
Compare adjacent elements and swap if needed
Insert each element into its correct position
quiz.answer: Select a pivot and partition the array around it

quiz.question: Quick Sort follows which algorithmic paradigm?
What is the average time complexity of Quick Sort?
When does Quick Sort perform worst?
options: When the array is already sorted and pivot is the first or last element
When pivot is the median element
quiz.answer: When the array is already sorted and pivot is the first or last element
